Class Shoe

java.lang.Object
Shoe
public class Shoe extends Object
Represents a shoe with a kind, color, brand, and size.

Some colors are grouped to default labels (e.g., "Neutral").

  • Constructor Details

    • Shoe

      public Shoe(Kind kind, Color color, Brand brand, double size)
      Constructs a Shoe.
      Parameters:
      kind - the kind of shoe (e.g., SNEAKER, DRESS)
      color - the color of the shoe (e.g., ORANGE, GREEN, BLUE)
      brand - the brand of the shoe
      size - the numeric size (e.g., 9.5)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if brand == NIKE && kind == DRESS or if size <= 0 or any enum is null

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a human-readable summary using default color categories and custom brand/kind capitalization.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      summary string, e.g. "Nike Sneaker in Neutral (size 9.5)".
